main event: Three witnesses observed a bright orange cigar-shaped object in the southwest sky for 15 minutes on July 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to emit a humming sound., The observers described the color of the object as bright orange., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes., The object appeared to move from east to west., No photographs or physical evidence were collected.
witness description: citizens of Coldwater who reported the sighting
